description:
Play Happy Fruits for FREE!
Download now the most popular slot game from real casinos.
Tons of bonuses are already waiting for you!

This 5 reel, feature rich, multi-level ,multi-stake slot game is action-packed, with a unique ‘crazy streak’ bingo’ bonus, a pick-a win feature and 3 progressive pots for BIG WINS!

•• Download now! 500 free credits on first install, free credits to collect every four hours! ••

•• Daily free credits for telling your friends about this game! ••

•• 20 Pay-lines ••

•• Play from 10 credits, then unlock the levels to play up to 10,000 credits with a maximum line win of x500 ••

•• Level up! Hidden behind the levels are a multitude of bonus awards, including higher staking, free credits and in-game bonuses and boosts ••

•• To win you need to have 3, 4 or 5 matching symbols adjacent on a win line. Win lines pay from the left to right only and wins can be paid on one, multiple or all win lines ••

•• ‘Wild’ symbols substitutes for any other symbol except for the ‘7’, ‘Splat’ and ‘Key’ bonus scatter symbols ••

•• An ‘Auto Play’ function is unlocked at level 5 which will auto spin until either one of the 3 feature wins are awarded or the next level is achieved••

•• ‘Crazy Streak’ Bonus
3 or more scatter ‘Key’ symbols triggers the ‘Crazy Streak’ Bonus. Spin the 3 reels and symbols on the middle line of the reels are accumulated on the win matrix, with symbols on reel 1 adding to column 1, 2 to column2 and reel 3 to column 3. Once 3 of a kind is complete, the corresponding win is awarded and those symbols clear, the streak ends when 3 x Killer Tomatoes are lit. Unlocking the killer tomatoes though the levels awards longer and bigger streaks. ••

•• Super 7’s Progressive feature
The 3 pots above the reels increase with every spin and super boosts are awarded at certain levels increasing the value of the pots further. A ‘7’ on reels 2, 3 and 4 will award the bronze pot, work your way through the levels to unlock and be awarded the Silver and Gold pots••

•• ‘Splat Bonus’
3 or more scatter ‘Splat’ symbols awards the ‘Splat’ Pick-me feature. Pick one of the symbols to reveal a hidden prize of up to x500••

•• Gamble Feature
Unlock the gamble feature and you can select to gamble any wins from the reels. The special gamble wheel allows you to control the risk and the amount you wish to gamble. You can even bank part of the winnings before gambling ••
